The Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu, Shri O. Paneerselvam, called on the Prime Minister today. https://t.co/F5KkBQExBe
The ban imposed on Jallikattu by the Supreme Court came up for discussion.
While appreciating the cultural significance of Jallikattu, the Prime Minister observed that the matter is presently sub-judice.
The Centre would be supportive of steps taken by the State Government.
PM @narendramodi assured CM Paneerselvam that all possible assistance would be provided to the State to address the drought situation.
A central team would be deputed to Tamil Nadu shortly.

"You are the first President of the Republic to visit this site" Louis Gallois from @GroupePSA @fhollande
"You have seen that the search for operational excellence is a reality within the @PSA Group" Yann Vincent @fhollande
"The Ardennes are a land of industrial tradition, it is a land where there is know-how and excellence" @fhollande #DirectPR
"There is no old or new industry Believe in the industry is believing in the future" @fhollande #DirectPR
"There is a transformation of the industry, you have to know how to adapt to it" @fhollande #DirectPR
"There can not be a France open to the world without its industry" @fhollande #DirectPR
"The idea of ​​closing, of withdrawal, it would be the end of the French industry" @fhollande #DirectPR
"There were threats of plant closures for the @GroupePSA, it was necessary for the state to react" @fhollande #DirectPR
"That's why we created the platform for the automotive industry" @GroupePSA @fhollande #DirectPR
"We had results, the auto market has recovered" @GroupePSA @fhollande
"I asked a report to Louis Gallois in 2012 to know the state of the industry" @GroupePSA @fhollande
"So, in the face of the industry's situation, I decided to set up the CICE" @GroupePSA @fhollande #DirectPR
"We have launched the program" industry of the future "which brings together all the actors to be ahead" @fhollande #DirectPR
"Thanks to all these efforts, the job has been preserved and @GroupePSA has found its way back to growth" @fhollande #DirectPR
"Builders with the support of public authorities will be able to produce more efficient and less polluting vehicles" @fhollande
"To the question of diesel, we must reduce its place step by step" @fhollande #DirectPR
"There must be a movement towards the electric vehicle" @fhollande #DirectPR @GroupePSA
"There are two issues for the automotive industry: the energy revolution and the digital revolution - you have to adapt to it" @fhollande
"We must not be afraid of the future The state is there, we must not be swayed, impress" @fhollande #DirectPR
"In France, we have the knowledge, the competence, the capacity to create, to innovate" @fhollande #DirectPR
"We must be proud of who we are and able to invest in the future, so we are sure to win" @fhollande #DirectPR
